pullrequest.title: Prevent scene graph updates when new entities are not present

content.raw:
With this change the two preceding PRs the `subt tunnel_circuit_02` world fluctuates between 4 and 10 % realtime. This is roughly a doubling of performance.

What I ran:

```
ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_02 -v 4
```
